entities.name: moody
entities.description: Professor Moody is a wizard who teaches Defense Against the Dark Arts. He has a magical eye that can see things clearly.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville Longbottom is a student in Professor Moody's class. He speaks in a small but distinct voice.

relationships.description: Professor Moody teaches Defense Against the Dark Arts to Neville and his classmates.
Professor Moody is teaching Neville Longbottom in class.
